Class Moving

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
SuperSmoothMover
Being
Moving
public class Moving extends Being
The Moving class consists of all the main characters in the game that are moving relative to the planets, including Bird, LittlePrince, and Fox subclasses.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zhiyu (Jennifer) Zhou

      flyInverted - Array of inverted flying animation frames.

    • act

      public void act()
      Act method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment. Includes placeholder content. Override this method to define the actor's behavior.
      Overrides:
      act in class Being

      public void prepareAnimation(greenfoot.GreenfootImage[] imgs, String frameName)
      Prepares animation frames from image files.
      Parameters:

    • prepareAnimation

      public void prepareAnimation(greenfoot.GreenfootImage[] imgs, String frameName, int width, int height)
      Prepares scaled animation frames from image files.
      Parameters:
      imgs - Array to store the animation frames.
      frameName - The base name of the image files.
      width - The width to scale the images to.
      height - The height to scale the images to.
